about_the_game:
The Aequitas Orbis original soundtrack as created by Stèv in both FLAC and MP3 (320 kbps) format.

Tracklist


  • Aequitas Orbis
  • Intergalactic BANG!
  • 1000 A S T E R O EEE D S
  • 80s_Bits
  • tRRRRR
  • Laserbeeeeams
  • Aequitas Credits

Songs will be placed in your Aequitas Orbis folder inside the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Aequitas Orbis\soundtrack\

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Intel processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Intel processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
